column4: Hullo experts :) I have this situation here - I've got unallocated space on my hard drive, and want to add it to my ubuntu partition, but obviously gpartedit won't let me since it's mounted
So can I do it from here, or do I need Windows/PartitionMagic?
I can't install anything when booted from a LiveCD, right?
the sysresccd.org iso has qtparted, FWIW
